basics.name: Arrington Walters
basics.label: Process Engineer at Tesla
basics.summary: Mechanical Engineer with a focus on OEE centric data science.

work.name: Tesla
highlights: Create and implement production processes for residential energy production lines.
Build key performance indicators (KPIs) to assess production line processes and to improve operations.
Collaborate with NPI, Firmware Team, Design, Equipment, and Manufacturing teams to manage products through the lifecycle.
Root cause failure modes within the manufacturing process and determine correction actions.

work.name: Howmet Aerospace
highlights: Utilized Python programming language to automate quality and supply-chain reports
Performed multivariate regression to adjust furnace standard operating procedures, capturing the study in a cross-industry standard process for data mining (CRISP-DM)
Managed 1.2 million dollar capital budget and subsidiary capital projects
Predictively modeled quality non-conformances and safety risks to prompt daily pre-task briefs
Managed site’s Power BI applications to broadcast department-specific key production indicators on overhead displays

work.name: Howmet Aerospace
highlights: Decreased CNC machine’s cycle times for high running parts, resulting in an increase of throughput dollars by 1 mil/month and the removal of  reliance on outside service providers
Lead site’s Human Performance program to teach employees that error-likely situations are predictable, manageable, and preventable
Administered site’s maintenance work order system
Implemented lean operational disciplines like 5S to decrease excessive handling and pedestrian and mobile equipment interference
Developed a Root Cause and Corrective Action process and formed a technical steering committee to monitor non-conformities and rework inventory

work.name: Randa Accessories
highlights: Managed the standard allowed minutes for an incentive program
Invented and implemented Visual Basic Applications used to appraise the value of incentive jobs
Coordinated a weekly debrief meeting with Senior Production Managers
Designed an open floor plan RFID module used to track pallet locations
Planned and allocated projects for Industrial Engineer intern

education.studyType: Master of Science - MS Information Systems: Data Analytics

education.institution: University of Maryland - A. James Clark School of Engineering

awards.title: Lean Six Sigma Innovation & Design: Green Belt Certificate
